http-action.name: /sap/bc/se/m/rest/theme_styles

header.name: user-agent
header.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

http-action.responseHeaders: HTTP/2.0 404 content-type: text/html Content-Length: 0 sap-server: true sap-perf-fesrec: 19256.000000 strict-transport-security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains
http-action.textPostContent: <THEME_STYLES><THEME id='9AB09B91720B1ED995908417B4648265' ui5VerKey='ver196'>/* SAP Screen Personas 3.0 Theme ver196 */.se-Window{background-image:url('/sap/bc/personas3/resource/?cz${c_sap_variable}%3D%3D');background-color:#F7F7F7;}.se-UserArea{background-color:#F7F7F7;}.se-CheckBox .se-LabelTextWrapper label, .se-CheckBox .se-LabelTextWrapper bdi{color:#232323;font-family:IBM Plex Sans;}.se-Switch .se-LabelTextWrapper label, .se-Switch .se-LabelTextWrapper bdi{color:#232323;font-family:IBM Plex Sans;}.se-ComboBox input, .se-ComboBox div button, .se-ComboBox div span, .se-ComboBox span{color:#232323;font-family:IBM Plex Sans;}.se-Panel{border-style:none;border-width:1px;border-radius:0px;border-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);}.se-Panel>.sapMPanelHdr{color:#232323;font-family:IBM Plex Sans;font-weight:bold;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);}.se-Input .sapMInputBaseContentWrapper:not(.sapMInputBaseContentWrapperState) input.sapMInputBaseInner, .se-Input .sapMInputBaseContentWrapper:not(.sapMInputBaseContentWrapperState):not(.se-Input-ValueHelp) .se-Input-ValueHelpInner{color:#232323;}.se-Input .sapMInputBaseContentWrapper:not(.sapMInputBaseContentWrapperState) input.sapMInputBaseInner{font-family:IBM Plex Sans;}.se-Label .se-LabelText, .se-Label a, .se-Label bdi{color:#232323;font-family:IBM Plex Sans;}.se-RadioButton label, .se-RadioButton bdi{color:#232323;font-family:IBM Plex Sans;}.se-StickyNote textarea{color:#232323;font-family:IBM Plex Sans;}.se-TextEdit .sapMInputBase.sapMTextArea textarea.sapMTextAreaInner{font-family:IBM Plex Sans;}.se-TextEdit textarea:not([readonly='readonly']){color:#232323;}.se-MainWindowHeaderBar.sapMIBar{background-color:#486CA7;}.se-MainWindowHeaderBar.sapMIBar-CTX .sapMLabel{color:rgba(255,255,255,1);}.se-HeaderToolbar .se-ToolbarButton .sapMBtnContent, .se-FlexToolbar .se-ToolbarButton .sapMBtnContent{color:#232323;font-family:IBM Plex Sans;}.se-Button>span.sapMBtnInner{font-family:IBM Plex Sans;}.personasBtn.p-wrapper{background:#003D73;}.personasBtn.p-wrapper>.p-main>.shape{border-color:rgba(255,255,255,1);}.se-IconTabBar.sapMITBItem .sapMITBText, .se-IconTabBar .sapMITBItem .sapMITBText{color:#232323;font-family:IBM Plex Sans;}.se-HeaderToolbar{background:#003D73;}.se-HeaderToolbar{background:#003D73;}.se-HeaderToolbar{background:rgba(255,255,255,1);}.se-HeaderToolbar{background:rgba(255,255,255,1);}.pbtnc.pbtnc{background:#003D73;}.se-StatusBar.sapMIBar.sapMFooter-CTX button:not(.se-HToolbarButton) .sapMBtnText.sapMBtnInner .sapMBtnContent{font-family:IBM Plex Sans;}</THEME></THEME_STYLES>
